name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that the fellow villagers who bought music for free at the Nanyang Midi Music Festival are being arrested one after another.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Villagers said that many people from the society came, some broke down the door and some climbed the wall. Soon, the things in the house were thrown on the roadside, the house was knocked down, and the scene was in a mess.
The reason why they insisted on holding on to the house was that the promised relocation house had not been delivered for two years and was unfinished.
It was useless to report it to the provincial government, because the problem would be sent back to the local government and there would be no solution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Starting from October 4, fans who had bought their music for free at Nanyang Midi gradually discovered that their lost items had begun to be sold on second-hand platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens raised questions:
Why did Evergrande’s Party Committee fail to prevent Evergrande’s collapse?
If the Party Committees of private enterprises cannot play a role, then what is the meaning of their existence?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: [Enter with caution] On the morning of October 3, an indiscriminate stabbing incident occurred in Guiping City, Guizhou Province. A man holding a kitchen knife stabbed anyone he saw on the street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: [Midi's bizarre announcement triggers ridicule] On October 5, in response to the recent "zero-yuan purchase" incident at Nanyang Midi, Midi officially issued an announcement stating that the "zero-yuan purchase" at Nanyang Midi was caused by someone posting false information that "the scene needs to be cleaned up after the music festival", which triggered villagers to go and loot and steal. It also stated that some organizations maliciously defamed Nanyang and Midi. However, the ending was shocking, stating that there were a lot of "stupid remarks" that discredited Henan and Nanyang in the previous announcement. The deletion of the announcement was to restore peace to Henan and repay the kindness of the people of Nanyang. Those who tried to discredit Nanyang and Midi by buying traffic were like ants trying to shake trees. As soon as the announcement came out, it triggered ridicule from all the big Vs on the Internet regardless of their camps. Netizens lamented that Midi united everyone with its own strength.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, at Johns Hopkins University in the United States, an international student graffitied a sculpture on campus to celebrate the 74th anniversary of the National Day. The next day, he was counterattacked by other international students with graffiti. On October 5, the sculpture was graffitied again. The graffiti artist left a "988" psychological intervention hotline, calling on previous graffiti artists to pay attention to their own mental health.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 5, the official public platform of the Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China Propaganda Department, "Zhejiang Propaganda", published a long article to expose the Japanese Johnny's Office. It said that the initiator of "sissy culture" Johnny's Office and its behind-the-scenes promoter, the United States, did everything they could to infiltrate and attempt to create a Chinese version of "sissy culture". They must eradicate the "sissy soil" and promote "tough guy culture", which caused ridicule from netizens. Netizens said: A true tough guy is not about body shape, but about daring to resist power and injustice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: The incident occurred in Guiping City, Guigang City, Guangxi Province
